text: Kelly Gallagher (born 24 April 1987) is a skier from Northern Ireland. She has a disability: she cannot see everything. She skied at the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships. She was the second skier to finish in the women's visually impaired slalom race. She was the third skier to finish in the women's slalom race. Because she cannot see, Charlotte Evans was her guide and told her where to go when going down the mountain. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Competitors at the 2018 Winter Paralympics Category:Northern Irish sportspeople Category:Skiers
title: Kelly Gallagher
